p: The results show that 97.5% uncertainties (±47.5% CI around the central estimate) of 182 cities fall in (−3.65%, 3.67%). The highest uncertainty appeared in Hegang (−5.83%, 5.86%), while the lowest appeared in Huizhou (−0.91%, 0.91%). Energy production and high emission cities usually have a relatively higher uncertainty of CO 2 emissions.
